DescDetail: Siren calls the Red Tide every 15s, during which its ATK is greatly improved but gains Vulnerable.
Siren calls the Red Tide every 15s, during which its ATK is greatly improved but gains Vulnerable.
Siren calls the Red Tide every 15s, during which its ATK is greatly improved but gains Vulnerable\n180s later, Siren goes Berserk.
Siren calls the Red Tide every 15s, during which its ATK is greatly improved but gains Vulnerable\n180s later, Siren goes Berserk.
Voodoo summons 4 Medic Bots every 15s and enters Invincible state. Destroy all Medic Bots to paralyze Voodoo for 10s, in which its Lightning DMG received increases.
Voodoo receives a special boost, increasing its tendency to attack while decreasing its DMG received. This boost is lost when it receives DMG over 40000 in one hit. Regenerates after 15s.

Pterygota Queen becomes weak to random colored orbs every 30s (the weakness lasts 15s). If she takes a high amount of damage during this time, she will be immobilized and vulnerable (the damage threshold increases with each trigger, up to 4 times).
Gabriel becomes weak to random colored orbs every 30s (the weakness lasts 15s), losing 60% of resistance to the particular color.

Monsters have a shield equal to 10% of Max HP and deal 10% more damage. The shield will be refreshed every 15s. Break the shield and the monster will lose 30% DMG Reduction. And a new shield will appear 15s later.
Riot will summon Terrapods after switching forms. Eliminate all Terrapods to bring Riot to the ground in advance and end the Laser Rain.
Avoid Acid Ant attacks
Enemies' weak points will be refreshed in a random direction. Break the weak points in the direction to deal massive True DMG to them.

Enemies will have 4 weak points that disappear in 4.5s and refresh 2s after that. Destroy all weak points to reduce the enemies' DMG Immunity by 20% for 20s. Characters will bleed if they stay on the battlefield for too long.
Defeat the Treants and the Faries
Pulao will gain 20% Extra DMG Bonus for every Dragon Force Combo she casts. The effect lasts for 20s and can be stacked up to 10 times.

Challenge Heaven Breaker, Demon Bane, and God Slayer respectively. (Use Uniframes and Speed Attacks wisely to fast reduce the enemy's Finisher Gauge value and defeat the enemy when the gauge is empty.)
The enemy gains high Ice, Lightning, and Dark Resistances but loses a significant amount of Fire Resistance. Maybe things will be different if you use Nanami?

After Starfarer casts the Signature Move, triggering "Oops! Missed it!" by pressing and holding Basic Attack will grant 20% Extra DMG Bonus, whereas each triggering "Perfect!" will grant 40% Extra DMG Bonus. The effect can be stacked up to 200% and lasts 10s. The duration will refresh whenever it is triggered.
Every time when a team member enters the field, gains a set of random Signal Orbs and 50% Basic Attack Fire DMG Bonus for 10s.
Defeat Gear and Wheel of Fortune
Upon eliminating an enemy, Haicma deals 100% more Ice DMG for 20s and restores 30 Energy. The duration will refresh whenever it is triggered.
Upon triggering a Speed Attack Skill, Haicma fully restores Dodge Gauge value and gains a set of Signal Orbs of a random color.
After casting a Yellow Orb skill, gain 1 Blue Orb. After casting a Blue Orb skill, gain 1 Yellow Orb
After casting [Radiant Whirlwind], your next [Radiant Whirlwind] deals 10% increased DMG for 10s (max 10 stacks)
After a 3-Ping, Basic Attack's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 100% for 3s
Defeat Ronin IV
Noan gains 3-Ping Orbs of a random color every time his Gear Level goes up.
Every time a Combo Strike is triggered at Gear Lv.3, Noan will deal 30% (up to 300%) more DMG.
Defeat the enemy!
Stigmata gains a set of 3-Ping Orbs when Afterglow Orbs are consumed in Luminous Realm or the Phase II Signature Move is cast.
Upon casting Illuminated Abyss, Stigmata deals more DMG. No stack limit. No time limit.
